commentBody:
I NEEDED A GOOD LAUGH. ARE YOU SERIOUS.

GIVE ME AVERAGE JOE SEATS. I CAN LAUGH MAKE JOKES WITHOUT WORRYING AM I SIPPING HOLDING MY GLASS CORRECTLY. ARE THERE CRUMBS ON MY MOUTH LOL.

DO I DO THIS OR THAT LOL. AM I SMILING TOO MUCH LOL.

THE PURPOSE OF THIS ARTICLE..WAS IT TO MAKE OUR MOUTHS DROOL WITH A GEE I WANT VIP SEATS.
NOT HATING JUST SO MUCH MORE IN LIFE.
HOOP HOOP DEE DOO.
